item.title: Blazor .NET 10 Migrate from .NET 8 to .NET 10
item.description: Blazor .NET 10 Migrate from .NET 8 to .NET 10 Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web applications using C# instead of JavaScript. It leverages the power of .NET to create rich client-side applications that run in the browser via WebAssembly or server-side through SignalR. Blazor provides a component-based architecture, making it easy to create reusable UI components. .NET 10: .NET 10 is the latest version of the .
